6 enum DefaultControlTableItemAddr{
7  ADDR_ITEM_MODEL_NUMBER = 0,
8  ADDR_ITEM_FIRMWARE_VER = 6,
9  ADDR_ITEM_ID = 7,
10  ADDR_ITEM_PROTOCOL_VER = 9
11 };

13 static bool isAddrInRange(uint16_t addr, uint16_t length, uint16_t range_addr, uint16_t range_length);
14 static bool isAddrInOtherItem(uint16_t start_addr, uint16_t length, uint16_t other_start_addr, uint16_t other_length);

17 Slave::Slave(DXLPortHandler &port, const uint16_t model_num, float protocol_ver)
18 : model_num_(model_num), protocol_ver_idx_(2), firmware_ver_(1), id_(1),
19  is_buf_malloced_(false), packet_buf_capacity_(0),
20  last_lib_err_(DXL_LIB_OK),
21  registered_item_cnt_(0)
22 {
23  setPort(port);
24  setPortProtocolVersion(protocol_ver);
25  addDefaultControlItem();
26 
27  p_packet_buf_ = new uint8_t[DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH];
28  if(p_packet_buf_ != nullptr){
29  packet_buf_capacity_ = DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH;
30  is_buf_malloced_ = true;
31  }
32  info_tx_packet_.is_init = false;
33  info_rx_packet_.is_init = false;
34 }

36 Slave::Slave(const uint16_t model_num, float protocol_ver)
37 : model_num_(model_num), protocol_ver_idx_(2), firmware_ver_(1), id_(1),
38  is_buf_malloced_(false), packet_buf_capacity_(0),
39  last_lib_err_(DXL_LIB_OK),
40  registered_item_cnt_(0)
41 {
42  setPortProtocolVersion(protocol_ver);
43  addDefaultControlItem();
44 
45  p_packet_buf_ = new uint8_t[DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH];
46  if(p_packet_buf_ != nullptr){
47  packet_buf_capacity_ = DEFAULT_DXL_BUF_LENGTH;
48  is_buf_malloced_ = true;
49  }
50  info_tx_packet_.is_init = false;
51  info_rx_packet_.is_init = false;

55 bool
56 Slave::setPacketBuffer(uint8_t* p_buf, uint16_t buf_capacity)
57 {
58  if(p_buf == nullptr){
59  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
60  return false;
61  }
62  if(packet_buf_capacity_ == 0){
63  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
64  return false;
65  }
66 
67  if(is_buf_malloced_ == true){
68  delete p_packet_buf_;
69  }
70  p_packet_buf_ = p_buf;
71  packet_buf_capacity_ = buf_capacity;
72 
73  return true;
74 }

88 bool
89 Slave::setPortProtocolVersion(float version)
90 {
91  uint8_t version_idx;
92 
93  if(version == 2.0){
94  version_idx = 2;
95  }else if(version == 1.0){
96  version_idx = 1;
97  }else{
98  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_PROTOCOL_VERSION;
99  return false;
100  }
101 
102  return setPortProtocolVersionUsingIndex(version_idx);
103 }
104 
105 bool
106 Slave::setPortProtocolVersionUsingIndex(uint8_t version_idx)
107 {
108  if(version_idx != 2 && version_idx != 1){
109  return false;
110  }
111  protocol_ver_idx_ = version_idx;
112 
113  return true;
114 }

134 bool
135 Slave::setID(uint8_t id)
136 {
137  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
138 
139  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2 && id >= 0xFD){ //http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol2/#packet-id
140  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_ID;
141  }else if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1 && id >= DXL_BROADCAST_ID){ //http://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/dxl/protocol1/#packet-id
142  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_ID;
143  }
144  last_lib_err_ = err;
145  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
146  return false;
147  }
148 
149  id_ = id;
150 
151  return true;
152 }

155 Slave::getID() const

172 bool
173 Slave::processPacket()
174 {
175  bool ret = true;
176 
177  if(rxInstPacket(p_packet_buf_, packet_buf_capacity_) != nullptr){
178  ret = processInst(info_rx_packet_.inst_idx);
179  }
180 
181  return ret;
182 }

185 uint8_t Slave::getNumCanBeRegistered() const
186 {
187  return CONTROL_ITEM_MAX-registered_item_cnt_;
188 }
189 
190 bool Slave::isEnoughSpaceInControlTable(uint16_t start_addr, uint16_t length)
191 {
192  uint16_t available_start_addr = control_table_[registered_item_cnt_].start_addr + control_table_[registered_item_cnt_].length;
193 
194  if(start_addr > CONTROL_ITEM_ADDR_LIMIT){
195  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_ADDR;
196  return false;
197  }
198 
199  if(length == 0 || length > CONTROL_ITEM_ADDR_LIMIT - available_start_addr){
200  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_ADDR_LENGTH;
201  return false;
202  }
203 
204  return true;
205 }
206 
207 
208 uint8_t Slave::addControlItem(uint16_t start_addr, uint8_t* p_data, uint16_t length)
209 {
210  if(registered_item_cnt_ >= CONTROL_ITEM_MAX){
211  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_BUFFER_OVERFLOW;
212  return last_lib_err_;
213  }
214 
215  if(p_data == nullptr){
216  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
217  return last_lib_err_;
218  }
219 
220  if(isEnoughSpaceInControlTable(start_addr, length) == false){
221  return last_lib_err_;
222  }
223 
224  for(uint16_t i=0; i < registered_item_cnt_; i++){
225  if(isAddrInOtherItem(start_addr, length, control_table_[i].start_addr, control_table_[i].length)){
226  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_INVAILD_ADDR;
227  return last_lib_err_;
228  }
229  }
230 
231  control_table_[registered_item_cnt_].start_addr = start_addr;
232  control_table_[registered_item_cnt_].length = length;
233  control_table_[registered_item_cnt_].p_data = p_data;
234 
235  registered_item_cnt_++;
236 
237  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_OK;
238 
239  return last_lib_err_;
240 }
241

244  return addControlItem(start_addr, (uint8_t*)&data, (uint16_t)sizeof(data));

357 
358 bool
359 Slave::processInstPing()
360 {
361  bool ret = false;
362  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
363  InfoToParseDXLPacket_t *p_rx_info;
364  uint8_t tx_param[3];
365  uint16_t tx_param_len = 0;
366 
367  p_rx_info = &info_rx_packet_;
368 
369  if(p_rx_info->id != DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
370  if(p_rx_info->protocol_ver == 2){
371  tx_param_len = 3;
372  if(tx_param_len+11 <= packet_buf_capacity_){
373  tx_param[0] = (uint8_t)(model_num_ >> 0);
374  tx_param[1] = (uint8_t)(model_num_ >> 8);
375  tx_param[2] = (uint8_t)firmware_ver_;
376  }else{
377  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
378  }
379  }else if(p_rx_info->protocol_ver == 1){
380  //
381  }else{
382  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_WRONG_PACKET;
383  }
384  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
385  ret = txStatusPacket(id_, 0, tx_param, tx_param_len);
386  }
387  }else{
388  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORT_BROADCAST;
389  }
390 
391  last_lib_err_ = err;
392 
393  return ret;
394 }
395 
396 
397 bool
398 Slave::processInstRead()
399 {
400  bool ret = false;
401  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
402  InfoToParseDXLPacket_t *p_rx_info;
403  uint8_t packet_err = 0;
404  uint8_t *p_rx_param, *p_tx_param;
405  uint16_t addr, addr_length = 0;
406 
407  // Parameter exception handling
408  if(p_port_ == nullptr){
409  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
410  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
411  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
412  }
413  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
414  last_lib_err_ = err;
415  return false;
416  }
417 
418  p_rx_info = &info_rx_packet_;
419  p_rx_param = p_rx_info->p_param_buf;
420 
421  if(p_rx_info->id != DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
422  if(p_rx_info->protocol_ver == 2){
423  if(p_rx_info->recv_param_len == 4){ //4 = Address(2)+AddressLength(2)
424  addr = ((uint16_t)p_rx_param[1]<<8) | (uint16_t)p_rx_param[0];
425  addr_length = ((uint16_t)p_rx_param[3]<<8) | (uint16_t)p_rx_param[2];
426  if(addr_length+11 > packet_buf_capacity_){
427  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
428  }
429  p_tx_param = &p_packet_buf_[9];
430  }else{
431  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_WRONG_PACKET;
432  }
433  }else if(p_rx_info->protocol_ver == 1){
434  if(p_rx_info->recv_param_len == 2){ //2 = Address(1)+AddressLength(1)
435  addr = p_rx_param[0];
436  addr_length = p_rx_param[1];
437  if(addr_length+6 > packet_buf_capacity_){
438  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
439  }
440  p_tx_param = &p_packet_buf_[5];
441  }else{
442  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_WRONG_PACKET;
443  }
444  }else{
445  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_WRONG_PACKET;
446  }
447 
448  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
449  uint8_t i, j;
450  uint16_t item_start_addr, item_addr_length;
451  ControlItem_t *p_item;
452  memset(p_packet_buf_, 0, packet_buf_capacity_);
453  for(i=0; i < registered_item_cnt_; i++){
454  p_item = &control_table_[i];
455  item_start_addr = p_item->start_addr;
456  item_addr_length = p_item->length;
457  if(item_addr_length != 0
458  && p_item->p_data != nullptr
459  && isAddrInRange(item_start_addr, item_addr_length, addr, addr_length) == true){
460  if(user_read_callback_ != nullptr){
461  user_read_callback_(item_start_addr, packet_err, user_read_callbakc_arg_);
462  if(packet_err != 0){
463  break;
464  }
465  }
466  for(j=0; j<item_addr_length; j++){
467  p_tx_param[item_start_addr-addr+j] = p_item->p_data[j];
468  }
469  }
470  }
471  ret = txStatusPacket(id_, packet_err, p_tx_param, addr_length);
472  }
473  }else{
474  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORT_BROADCAST;
475  }
476 
477  last_lib_err_ = err;
478 
479  return ret;
480 }
481 
482 
483 bool
484 Slave::processInstWrite()
485 {
486  bool ret = false;
487  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
488  InfoToParseDXLPacket_t *p_rx_info;
489  uint8_t *p_rx_param, *p_data;
490  uint8_t packet_err = 0;
491  uint16_t addr, data_length = 0;
492 
493  p_rx_info = &info_rx_packet_;
494  p_rx_param = p_rx_info->p_param_buf;
495 
496  if(p_rx_info->id == DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
497  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORT_BROADCAST;
498  return false;
499  }
500 
501  // extract start address and length from the instruction packet
502  switch (p_rx_info->protocol_ver)
503  {
504  case 2:
505  if(p_rx_info->recv_param_len <= 2) { //2 = Address(2)+Data(n)
506  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_WRONG_PACKET;
507  }
508  else {
509  addr = ((uint16_t)p_rx_param[1]<<8) | (uint16_t)p_rx_param[0];
510  p_data = &p_rx_param[2];
511  data_length = p_rx_info->recv_param_len-2;
512  if(data_length+11 > packet_buf_capacity_){
513  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
514  }
515  }
516  break;
517 
518  case 1:
519  if(p_rx_info->recv_param_len <= 1){ //1 = Address(1)+Data(n)
520  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_WRONG_PACKET;
521  }
522  else {
523  addr = p_rx_param[0];
524  p_data = &p_rx_param[1];
525  data_length = p_rx_info->recv_param_len-1;
526  if(data_length+6 > packet_buf_capacity_){
527  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_ENOUGH_BUFFER_SIZE;
528  }
529  }
530  break;
531 
532  default:
533  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_WRONG_PACKET;
534  break;
535  }
536 
537  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
538  uint8_t i, j;
539  uint8_t backup_data[32]; // we max support registers of 32 bytes
540  uint16_t item_start_addr, item_addr_length;
541  ControlItem_t *p_item;
542 
543  for(i=0; i < registered_item_cnt_; i++){
544 
545  p_item = &control_table_[i];
546  item_start_addr = p_item->start_addr;
547  item_addr_length = p_item->length;
548 
549  if(item_addr_length != 0 && p_item->p_data != nullptr
550  && isAddrInRange(item_start_addr, item_addr_length, addr, data_length) == true){
551 
552  // backup data, copy new data
553  for(j=0; j<item_addr_length; j++){
554  // backup supported only for registers smaller than 32 bytes
555  if (item_addr_length <= 32) {
556  backup_data[j] = p_item->p_data[j];
557  }
558  p_item->p_data[j] = p_data[item_start_addr - addr + j];
559  }
560  // Check data for ID, Protocol Version (Act as a system callback)
561  switch (item_start_addr) {
562 
563  case ADDR_ITEM_ID: // validate ID
564  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 2 && id_ >= 0xFD){
565  packet_err = DXL2_0_ERR_DATA_RANGE;
566  }
567  if(protocol_ver_idx_ == 1 && id_ >= 0xFE){
568  packet_err |= 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_RANGE_BIT;
569  }
570  break;
571 
572  case ADDR_ITEM_PROTOCOL_VER: // validate Protocol Version
573  if(protocol_ver_idx_ != 1 && protocol_ver_idx_ != 2){
574  if(backup_data[0] == 2){
575  packet_err = DXL2_0_ERR_DATA_RANGE;
576  }
577  else if(backup_data[0] == 1){
578  packet_err |= 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_RANGE_BIT;
579  }
580  }
581  break;
582 
583  case ADDR_ITEM_MODEL_NUMBER: // model number if Read Only
584  case ADDR_ITEM_FIRMWARE_VER: // firmware is Read Only
585  if(backup_data[0] == 2){
586  packet_err = DXL2_0_ERR_DATA_RANGE;
587  }
588  else if(backup_data[0] == 1){
589  packet_err |= 1<<DXL1_0_ERR_RANGE_BIT;
590  }
591  break;
592 
593  }
594 
595  // Run user callback for Write instruction
596  //
597  // NOTE: Slave does not implement EEPROM persistence of data.
598  // If your device needs to persist data to ROM you must implement
599  // `user_write_callback_` and there save the registers to ROM
600  // including the ones implemented in Slave (id, protocol,
601  // model number, firmware version)
602  if (packet_err == 0 && user_write_callback_ != nullptr){
603  user_write_callback_(item_start_addr, packet_err, user_write_callbakc_arg_);
604  }
605 
606  if(packet_err != 0){
607  // If an error occurs restore the previous data.
608  // backup supported only for registers smaller than 32 bytes
609  if (item_addr_length <= 32) {
610  for(j=0; j<item_addr_length; j++){
611  p_item->p_data[j] = backup_data[j];
612  }
613  }
614  }
615 
616  } // if
617 
618  } // for
619 
620  ret = txStatusPacket(id_, packet_err, nullptr, 0);
621  }
622 
623  last_lib_err_ = err;
624 
625  return ret;
626 }
627 
628 bool
629 Slave::addDefaultControlItem()
630 {
631  if(addControlItem(ADDR_ITEM_MODEL_NUMBER, (uint16_t&)model_num_) != DXL_LIB_OK
632  || addControlItem(ADDR_ITEM_FIRMWARE_VER, firmware_ver_) != DXL_LIB_OK
633  || addControlItem(ADDR_ITEM_ID, id_) != DXL_LIB_OK
634  || addControlItem(ADDR_ITEM_PROTOCOL_VER, protocol_ver_idx_) != DXL_LIB_OK){
635  return false;
636  }
637 
638  return true;
639 }
640 
641 bool
642 Slave::processInst(uint8_t inst_idx)
643 {
644  bool ret = false;
645 
646  switch(inst_idx)
647  {
648  case DXL_INST_PING:
649  ret = processInstPing();
650  break;
651 
652  case DXL_INST_READ:
653  ret = processInstRead();
654  break;
655 
656  case DXL_INST_WRITE:
657  ret = processInstWrite();
658  break;
659 
660  default:
661  last_lib_err_ = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NOT_SUPPORTED;
662  break;
663  }
664 
665  return ret;
666 }
667 
668 
669 bool
670 Slave::txStatusPacket(uint8_t id, uint8_t err_code, uint8_t *p_param, uint16_t param_len)
671 {
672  bool ret = false;
673  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
674 
675  // Parameter exception handling
676  if(p_port_ == nullptr
677  || (param_len > 0 && p_param == nullptr)){
678  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
679  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
680  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
681  }
682  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
683  last_lib_err_ = err;
684  return false;
685  }
686 
687  // Send Status Packet
688  begin_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, id, protocol_ver_idx_,
689  DXL_INST_STATUS, err_code, p_packet_buf_, packet_buf_capacity_);
690  add_param_to_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_, p_param, param_len);
691  err = end_make_dxl_packet(&info_tx_packet_);
692  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
693  p_port_->write(info_tx_packet_.p_packet_buf, info_tx_packet_.generated_packet_length);
694  ret = true;
695  }
696 
697  last_lib_err_ = err;
698 
699  return ret;
700 }
701 
702 const InfoToParseDXLPacket_t*
703 Slave::rxInstPacket(uint8_t* p_param_buf, uint16_t param_buf_cap)
704 {
705  InfoToParseDXLPacket_t *p_ret = nullptr;
706  DXLLibErrorCode_t err = DXL_LIB_OK;
707 
708  // Parameter exception handling
709  if(p_port_ == nullptr
710  || (param_buf_cap > 0 && p_param_buf == nullptr)){
711  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_NULLPTR;
712  }else if(p_port_->getOpenState() != true){
713  err = DXL_LIB_ERROR_PORT_NOT_OPEN;
714  }
715  if(err != DXL_LIB_OK){
716  last_lib_err_ = err;
717  return nullptr;
718  }
719 
720  // Receive Instruction Packet
721  begin_parse_dxl_packet(&info_rx_packet_, protocol_ver_idx_, p_param_buf, param_buf_cap);
722  while(p_port_->available() > 0)
723  {
724  err = parse_dxl_packet(&info_rx_packet_, p_port_->read());
725  if(err == DXL_LIB_OK){
726  if((protocol_ver_idx_ == 2 && info_rx_packet_.inst_idx != DXL_INST_STATUS)
727  || protocol_ver_idx_ == 1){
728  if(info_rx_packet_.id == id_ || info_rx_packet_.id == DXL_BROADCAST_ID){
729  p_ret = &info_rx_packet_;
730  }
731  break;
732  }
733  }else if(err != DXL_LIB_PROCEEDING){
734  break;
735  }
736  }
737 
738  last_lib_err_ = err;
739 
740  return p_ret;
741 }
742 
743 
744 
745 static bool isAddrInRange(uint16_t addr, uint16_t length,
746  uint16_t range_addr, uint16_t range_length)
747 {
748  return (addr >= range_addr && addr+length <= range_addr+range_length) ? true:false;
749 }
750 
751 static bool isAddrInOtherItem(uint16_t start_addr, uint16_t length,
752  uint16_t other_start_addr, uint16_t other_length)
753 {
754  bool ret = false;
755  uint16_t addr_end = start_addr + length;
756  uint16_t other_addr_end = other_start_addr + other_length;
757 
758  // The start address of the item is in the range of another item address.
759  if (start_addr >= other_start_addr && start_addr < other_addr_end){
760  ret = true;
761  // The last address of an item is in the range of another item address.
762  }else if (addr_end > other_start_addr && addr_end <= other_addr_end){
763  ret = true;
764  }
765 
766  return ret;
767 }
